features: 【Multifunctional Pocket Printer】This mini inkless printer is designed for ultimate portability. Our pocket mobile printer is ideal for printing black and white, which can be used into photos, memos, shopping lists, study/meeting notes, business and work plans, office aids, labels, lists, web pages, QR codes and so on. Suitable for various applications such as office, students, amateur archivists, treasure moms etc.

【Wireless Bluetooth Connection】Our compact travel wireless printer is easy to operate. Kindly Please following this 2 steps: The first step is to search and download the app "Tiny Print" in the App Store or search on Google. The second step is to long press the printer switch, the bear light blinking green, turn on the Bluetooth device of the mobile phone, open the "Tiny Print" application and click "connect", refresh and click "X7" and connect. This mini printer support IOS+Android.

【Different Printing paper roll gifts】This upgraded mini pocket sticker printer come with two rolls of white paper, three rolls of colored paper (blue, pink, yellow), and one roll of self-adhesive paper. you can cut the printouts into labels of any shape and size just with a scissor. The size of printer paper is 57*26mm (width X diameter), when you have finished using the paper roll we sent you, you can choose to buy another roll of the same size and continue to use our printer.

【Inkless Technology Thermal Printer】Our portable printer featuring thermal technology for clear prints don't require ink, toner, or ribbons. Equipped with a high-quality thermal print head that generates patterns on thermal paper by heating without using ink. 200 DPI high-resolution black and white images can be printed more clearly. Portable printers wireless for travel, lower cost compared to inkjet printers, and also can be used everywhere!

【Practical and Unique Gift】Our inkless printer combines functionality with exceptional gifting possibilities. Let them to experience the joy and convenience of having a pocket printer right at their fingertips, Which is ideal for friends and family who love photography and DIY projects. Birthdays, Halloween, Thanksgiving, Christmas Gift. Come with 1 mini printer + 5 rolls printing paper + 1 USB cable + 1 user manual +1 bags. If you have any operational problems, please feel free to contact us.

Turn on the Printer Long press the switch then turn on the printer. Green light: the printer is standby. Red light: Charging/out ofpaper/overheating/cover is opened Flashing red: Low battery Open the Case Hold the sticker printer and then open the case easily. Install the Paper Roll Please place the printing paper in the correct direction. (Only one side can be printing) Connect Bluetooth in APP to Printer Turn on the APP "Tiny Printer" and bluetooth, connect the bluetooth in the APP, then you can printer.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Gave as a gift for grand child and he saids its cool. He is having fun printing there selfies

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My son love it
reviews.reviewText: I bought this super cute printer for my son and he loves it. My 11 yr old can easily get it connect to his phone. He can print whatever he wants with this tiny printer. He brought it to school and his friends love it too. Really happy with the purchase!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this printer
reviews.reviewText: I love this Bluetooth Wireless printer. Is easy to use, and so much help for printing anything but not big. So I dont need to use my regular printer. Because is small I can bring it anywhere.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to use
reviews.reviewText: Love this thing. You have to download an app. It’s free , super easy to use. I been using to label things. Comes with extra paper and a bag protect it. Good quality. Super cute character in the front. It’s green when it’s charged and red when it needs battery.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Handy little picture printer
reviews.reviewText: I got this for my pre-k class and I love it. It was simple to figure out , the app is very simple. It comes in handy in my classroom.

reviews.reviewerName: Matea Thomas | US UGC Content Creator & TiktokerMatea Thomas | US UGC Content Creator & Tiktoker
reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Compact and useful!
reviews.reviewText: The Printer is very straightforward and easy to use reading the manual, which is in about five other languages besides English. The printer is Bluetooth through a tiny speaker app that is available on Google and Apple app stores, and is easy to use. As there are five other rolls of printing in addition to one already in the printer and it prints in black-and-white, no color . I like that I can print out pictures from my camera roll or the ones I have downloaded in my camera roll . As long as you can download the app tiny printer the portable printer should be able to work just fine.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Small but mighty
reviews.reviewText: My daughter wanted one for her school work so she could print out flash card diagrams without trying to resize on printer. This is perfect.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute little camera
reviews.reviewText: My daughter is loving this thing. It’s been keeping her busy for hours now. It’s easy to use and prints well enough. She also loves the little bear face on the front.
